text:
Fix #338.
- use plt.draw_if_interactive() to avoid having to do plt.draw()
  manually
- use a solid rather than a transparent color to show the edges to make
  them more visible

text:
Fixes for add_edges et al. methods

* use plt.draw_if_interactive() to avoid having to do plt.draw()
  manually
* use a solid rather than a transparent color to show the edges to make
  it more visible
